details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-1:2014 - 7.21 Fonts - 7.21.4 Embedding - CharSet entry in Type1 fonts
details.description: If the FontDescriptor dictionary of an embedded Type 1 font contains a CharSet string, then it shall list the character names of all glyphs present in the font program, regardless of whether a glyph in the font is referenced or used by the PDF or not.

rule.description: If the FontDescriptor dictionary of an embedded Type 1 font contains a CharSet string, then it shall list the character names of all glyphs present in the font program, regardless of whether a glyph in the font is referenced or used by the PDF or not.
rule.test: fontFile_size == 0 || fontName.search(/[A-Z]{6}\+/) != 0 || CharSet == null || charSetListsAllGlyphs == true

error.message: A CharSet entry in the Descriptor dictionary of a Type1 font incorrectly lists glyphs present in the font program
